member.name: M:EManagersLib.API.PropAPI.GetPropArray
member.summary: This is a helper function to get the prop Array32

member.name: M:EManagersLib.API.PropAPI.GetPropBuffer
member.summary: This is a helper function to get the prop buffer array
member.returns: Returns EPropInstance[] within Array32 of prop array

member.name: M:EManagersLib.API.PropAPI.GetPropLimit
member.summary: This is a helper function to get the current max limit set for props
member.returns: Returns an int that indicates the current max prop limit
